title: Scenario: Sorting of players
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled to the top
custom_expected:
Then
There should be four buttons (options) for positions - P, C, IF, OF

title: Scenario: Clicking on the Pitcher filter.
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled to the top
and
P is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
Only pitchers should be shown 
and 
the URL remains unchanged.

title: Scenario: Clicking on the Catcher filter.
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled to the top of the page
and 
C is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
Only the catchers should be displayed
and
the URL should remain unchanged.

title: Scenario: Clicking on the infielder filter
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com/<file_code>/roster
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled to the top
and
IF is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
Only the infielders are shown
and
the url remains unchanged.

title: Scenario: Clicking on the outfielder filter
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled to the top and OF is clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
Only the outfielders are displayed
and
the url remains unchanged.
